DOC.brief_summary: The study is aimed to develop a new reaction-time based method for examining the visual field and to study the effect of refractive error on the magnification of a fundus photograph in order to evaluate the true size of a retinal feature.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Location of the Blind Spot and the Macula-disc Centre Distance on a Fundus Photograph
DOC.criteria: No disease that effect the fundus photograph or visual field any disease that effects the fundus photograph or visual field
